plot: Ahlam wishes to choose her own life path but in her Druze village, Daliat-El-Carmel, She always has to be under a man's support. Seeking answers, she consults with her two aunts who have never married nor had any children.
title: Kmo Lirkav al Ofanaim
plot_es: Ahlam wishes to choose her own life path but in her Druze village, Daliat-El-Carmel, She always has to be under a man's support. Seeking answers, she consults with her two aunts who have never married nor had any children.
plot_en: Ahlam wishes to choose her own life path but in her Druze village, Daliat-El-Carmel, She always has to be under a man's support. Seeking answers, she consults with her two aunts who have never married nor had any children.
